Label: Participant
Definition: Someone who takes part in an activity. [def-source: NCI]

Label: Blood Pressure Measurement
Definition: Measurement of the pressure, or force per area, exerted by circulating blood against the walls of the blood vessels. The pressure is dependent on the energy of the heart action, elasticity of the vessel walls and volume and viscosity of the blood. [def-source: CMO]

Label: First Reading
Definition: A time internval is a contiguous temporal region having some duration. [def-source: SIO]

Label: Second Reading
Definition: A time internval is a contiguous temporal region having some duration. [def-source: SIO]

Label: Third Reading
Definition: A time internval is a contiguous temporal region having some duration. [def-source: SIO]

Label: Fourth Reading
Definition: A time internval is a contiguous temporal region having some duration. [def-source: SIO]

Label: Reading
Definition: A datum that is presented to a user by a meter or similar instrument. [def-source: NCI]
